answers.answer: I'm going Friday for that 2 hours long wait hope I don't get dizzy
I had mine yesterday and at about the hour mark after drinking it I got way dizzy.
It didn't make me dizzy but drink some water after so the after taste can go away faster lol
It made me wanna puke 4 years ago with my son. Not looking forward to it this time round
Totally hate that crap. I got very nauseous after about a half hr of drinking it.
I got dizzy & I was driving. Freaked me out lol
I ended up throwing it up 20 minutes before my test ended. Thank God I didn't have to do it again. It's the worst test ever. My bones and muscles were aching and the two hours weren't passing! Urgh!!
It made me wanna vomit as soon as i drank it bt i tried to control myself so i would have to repeat it and i passed wit the 1hr test
I got mid week, they gave me to choose from fruit punch (red) or lemon-lime (clear).  I chose lemon-lime, it tasted like flat sprite. No nausea,  so it wasn't too bad for me.

I felt really tired the rest of the day. Luckily I passed! I don't want to be diabetic again! Oh and just and FYI I work in a lab and run the test. You are not supposed to eat or drink anything until after your test is done.

question: Did anyone else get dizzy after drinking that orange crap stuff for gestational diabetes testing?
title: Gestational diabetes testing
